Interface ec.util.Vat

public interface Vat
extends ClaLoader
A Vat is an object which has control of an objectspace. There are only a few operations one can do on a Vat directly. As a ClassLoader, a Vat represents its primordial class loader.

checkpoint(OutputStream)
Perform a checkpoint to the given stream.
egc()
Perform EGC.
terminate()
Terminate this vat.

egc 
  public abstract void egc()
Perform EGC.

checkpoint 
  public abstract void checkpoint(OutputStream stream)
Perform a checkpoint to the given stream.

Parameters:
stream - the stream to output checkpoint information to.
terminate 
  public abstract void terminate()
Terminate this vat.
